title: New Win11 Laptop Install of Thunderbird and "Settings" will not show
content:
Hello, 

   I just finished installing all my tools and such on my new laptop (Dell 7780).   The laptop is Win 11 Pro with all updates for 24H2.    I installed Thunderbird (128.3.2esr 64bit).     I have used Thunderbird for over 20 years  or so.   I know how to move profiles, etc.   Well, I moved my profiles from old laptop to new laptop and everything was working fine.       Today, I tried to go into Thunderbird Settings (NOT Account Settings).    if I go through the menu Tools \ Settings.   Nothing happens.    Use the ||| on the taskbar,  NOTHING HAPPENS.    Open "Account Settings" and go down to  * Thunderbird Settings,   NOTHING HAPPENS.      Tried using Troubleshooting and restart with no change. 
   I also reverted back to the original Profile that was the default when it installed.   I then imported from my other profile saved off.   Same deal, cannot open Settings.  (Tried before Import and after). 
  What have I done wrong?  What can I try and massage to get the window to show?

Thanks,

Joe
creator: jkaisler
